Name: First UK Umbraco level 2 training available

Content.summary: 'First UK Umbraco level 2 training available' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about London, Bonhill House in London, looking forward, Hospitality Recreation written on 28 October 2010
Content.tags: London, Bonhill House in London, looking forward, Hospitality Recreation
Content.bodyText:
The first UK Umbraco level 2 training and certification course is now listed on Umbraco.org and available to book through Ferguson Moriyama. The course will be on December the 2nd and 3rd at Bonhill House in London. Spaces are limited so early reservation is recommended.

It has been a mad few days getting the infrastructure to run the courses in place, but I've prepared a test run with 6 brave test course atendees who will be coming to London in the next couple of weeks.

I've spent a large amount of time in the last few days learning the course materials and adding to them where I see appropriate and I'm excited an looking forward to getting out there and getting more people into Umbraco.

I must admit I'm slightly daunted by the atendee list for the test course. The collective Umbraco knowledge in the room is going to be quite something. We've got a current MVP and at least one or two guys who are destined to be MVPs of the future. I'm working hard to be on a par with these guys and have got a few off piste activities to challenge those who finish up their excercises too quickly!

Also - I've noticed that my test course falls on the eve of the cogworks monthly Umbraco social in London so I'll be persuading my atendees to come along for what should be a pretty good turn out. Hope to see you all there.

Now back to Linq2Umbraco practice :)
